message_status = #{status,javaType=MessageStatus,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
isRead = #{isRead},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT mr.id,message_status,isRead,message,sendDate,sender,detail,title,receiver,content FROM message_receive mr LEFT OUTER JOIN message_send ms ON mr.message = ms.id LEFT OUTER JOIN message_detail md ON ms.detail = md.id WHERE mr.id = #{id} AND mr.isDeleted = false
mapper.update: UPDATE message_receive SET isDeleted = true WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE message_receive mr LEFT OUTER JOIN message_send ms ON mr.`message` = ms.`id` SET mr.isDeleted = TRUE WHERE DATE(ms.`sendDate`) <= DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{days} DAY)) AND mr.message_status = #{status,javaType=MessageStatus,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}
